title: The Favorites - Super Bowl LVI Top Prop Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - Super Bowl LVI Top Prop Bets
description:
With the greatest spectacle in American sports just a few days away, Chad Millman and professional bettor Simon Hunter of the Action Network welcome their colleagues Chris Raybon and Sean "The Oddsmaker" Koerner to the show. Every week this NFL season, Chris and Sean joined the guys on their live NFL betting show "Convince Me," and this week they're lending their expertise on prop betting and player projections. Together they go through their favorite prop bets for the Super Bowl, including longest catch, longest punt and Super Bowl MVP bets. The guys go as deep as they can on the game script and the juiciest gambling opportunities, and lay out how they each approach betting on the biggest game of the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
